text: Linthal was a municipality of the canton of Glarus in Switzerland. On 1 January 2011, the former municipalities of Linthal, Betschwanden, Braunwald, Elm, Engi, Haslen, Luchsingen, Matt, Mitlödi, Rüti, Schwanden, Schwändi and Sool merged into the municipality of Glarus Süd. ==Other websites== * Official website of Linthal Category:Former municipalities of Glarus Category:2011 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Linthal
